rows.label: qev095101_MSG0001
rows.name:
I have a top-secret mission for you,
[ST:playername ].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095101_MSG0002
rows.name: Commander Vandham even asked for you by name.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095101_JNK0010
rows.name: Ask about Mission

rows.label: qev095101_SEL0011
rows.name: Press Stella for a detailed briefing.

rows.label: qev095101_JNK0020
rows.name: Ask about Stella

rows.label: qev095101_SEL0021
rows.name: Inquire as to what Stella's job is.

rows.label: qev095101_MSG0003
rows.name: Zero hesitation. You BLADEs don't mess around.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095101_MSG0004
rows.name: I'll get right to it, then.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095101_MSG0005
rows.name:
I'd rather not say too much, but I'm a member of an...
intelligence agency, let's call it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095101_MSG0006
rows.name:
I serve as a courier of sorts, delivering sensitive
missions from the commander or director general
to the individuals they're intended for.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095101_MSG0007
rows.name:
Just think of me as your friendly neighborhood
message girl.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095101_MSG0008
rows.name: You expanded FrontierNav into Oblivia, correct?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095101_MSG0009
rows.name: Well, that's given us access to new Ganglion intel.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095101_MSG0010
rows.name:
Perhaps you're familiar with the Prone village in
southern Oblivia?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095101_MSG0011
rows.name:
We've learned there are xenoforms in that village being
held as forced laborers.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095101_MSG0012
rows.name:
They are neither human nor Nopon—it's an entirely
new alien race.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095101_MSG0013
rows.name:
If we can free them and win them over to our side,
we stand to gain a mountain of intel on the Prone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095101_MSG0014
rows.name:
There's even a strong chance they might join us as
allies like the Ma-non and Nopon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095101_MSG0015
rows.name:
You can see how this opportunity is too tasty for us to
pass up. So, how about it then?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095101_MSG0016
rows.name: Excellent. The commander said you'd say that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095101_MSG0017
rows.name:
Judging from our maps, this is a pretty large Prone
settlement, so expect some heavy resistance.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095101_MSG0018
rows.name:
But there are a number of viable infiltration routes.
As long as you stay cool out there, you should be fine.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095101_MSG0019
rows.name: Best of luck.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095101_MSG0020
rows.name:
Those unidentified xenoforms are being held at
Scabland Fortress in southern Oblivia.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095101_MSG0021
rows.name: Your job is to liberate them, whatever the cost.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095101_MSG0022
rows.name: Wh-what? Prone in the city?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095101_MSG0023
rows.name:
Dammit! How did they break through our defenses?!
We need the Harriers here NOW![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095101_JNK0030
rows.name: Explain

rows.label: qev095101_SEL0031
rows.name: Tell Stella that these Prone are not hostile.

rows.label: qev095101_JNK0040
rows.name: Soothe

rows.label: qev095101_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Stella to assess the situation calmly.

rows.label: qev095101_MSG0024
rows.name:
...Two different tribes under Ganglion rule? Really?
I had no idea.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095101_MSG0025
rows.name:
Just that alone is an incredibly valuable piece of intel.
Excellent work, [ST:playername ].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095101_MSG0026
rows.name:
But they're PRONE! We can't let bloodthirsty animals
like that just waltz in here and—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095101_MSG0027
rows.name: Enough, Stella. These Prone are not aggressive.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095101_MSG0028
rows.name: We are Tree Clan. We fight Cavern Clan.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095101_MSG0029
rows.name:
So there are two different tribes under Ganglion rule?
I had no idea.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095101_MSG0030
rows.name:
Just that alone is an incredibly valuable piece of intel.
Excellent work, [ST:playername ].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095101_MSG0031
rows.name: So the tribes are called Cavern Clan and Tree Clan.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095101_MSG0032
rows.name:
It seems the landscape within the Ganglion camp is
more complex than we'd imagined.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095101_MSG0033
rows.name:
Director General, forgive me for putting this so
indelicately, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095101_MSG0034
rows.name:
I believe these Tree Clan members could be of
considerable use to us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095101_MSG0035
rows.name: Agreed. I will authorize their residence in New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095101_MSG0036
rows.name:
I'll also inform Defense Secretary Nagi and the others,
and take care of the necessary paperwork.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095101_MSG0037
rows.name: I give thanks to Great Tree. And to Earth aliens![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095101_MSG0038
rows.name:
In exchange, perhaps you will agree to share what you
know of the Ganglion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095101_MSG0039
rows.name: Does it win Tree Clan freedom? Then I will help.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095101_MSG0040
rows.name:
You have my thanks. 
Stella, will you assist them in their transition, please?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095101_MSG0041
rows.name: Of course, sir.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095101_MSG0042
rows.name:
My name is Stella. If there is anything you need,
please don't hesitate to mention it, Mr...um...Prone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095101_MSG0043
rows.name: I am Sevvy Belgazus. Proud leader of Tree Clan![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095101_MSG0044
rows.name: Well, welcome to New LA, Sevvy Belgazus![ST:wait ]
